tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ******* ****** ** * **** ************** efficient, kind doctor, highly approachable. He always gives enough time and has a lot of patience to hear the problem faced by the patient. The medicines he prescribed and the exercise he recommended really helped my mother to get rid of the knee pain she was suffering for so long! In the course of my association with him, I find him a doctor on whom I have immense faith and would follow his advice ** * **** **** ** ** *** **** *** ** ******* I am so confident that he is such a good doctor in his field and also a very kind being that I have recommended him, to many those who are on the lookout for a good orthopaedic doctor. I wish him success in his field

Doctor Prajyot Jagtap went through the case as my hand was plastured but the bones were not aligned properly the plastured was done 18 days before, then ask to do X ray after that suggested for operation, Operation done on 1st April with K wire for small bone osteotomy. Feeling better after surgery one more X ray which shows both bones are adjuste perfectly which was not done previously.

I confirmed with Practo customer service They said that if appointment is confirmed then Dr will be available The OPD was closed today due to Gudi Padwa No doctors were present Bad communication on part of Practo

Very kind, doesn't make frighten with disease.
Explains in a very positive manner and guides towards effective treatment..
Obaidur Rehman

I reached on time for a 7pm appointment and was told that the doctor only enters by 745pm. And this was even after confirming the time with the clinic. I don't understand why I was called for a 7pm appointment when the doctor himself comes in only by 745pm. I didn't wait of course and left immediately.

My mom had been to hospital and it was for health issue. ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. We are satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Medical tests were done. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went. Physiotherapy was suggested.
Dr Prajyot Jagtap was amazing. Really good to talk, took care of me whilr nd before getting operated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First of all my appointment on 26 May was cancelled by the Doctor and booked for next day. I had to wait there for more than 1 hour to see the doctor. Secondly the charges were 1500 instead of 1000 as mentioned in the practo app.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thanks to Dr. Prajyot Jagtap..He explain and talk very well and treatment was up to the mark...He is a good orthopedic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent. Line of treatment appropriate. Explanation about the aiment in depth to patient & appropriate care post treatment.
